sentences: Lukáš Pohůnek (born 24 October 1988, Žilina, former Czechoslovakia) is a Slovak conductor and trumpet player.
At 13, he performed as a soloist with the Slovak Philharmonic, the Janacek Philharmonic Orchestra and the Bohuslav Martinu Philharmonic under the baton of Jakub Hrůša.
During his studies, he participated in master classes at the Accademia Musicale Chigiana with Gianluigi Gelmetti as well as in Valencia with George Pehlivanian.
